A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A film that destroys the legacy of Star Wars\, full of plot holes\, contrivances\, every interesting moment being undercut with ridiculousness\, and mostly bad attempts at humor. It made me consider the new sequel trilogy noncanon\, and I will not go see episode nine in a cinema - it will be the first Star Wars film I will miss on a big screen. I do not want to reward Disney's corporate masters for their mediocrity.
